original_text: Go up into Gilead, and take balm, O virgin, the daughter of Egypt: in vain shalt thou use many medicines; for thou shalt not be cured.
korean_text: 처녀 딸 애굽이여 길르앗으로 올라가서 유향을 취하라 네가 치료를 많이 받아도 효력이 없어 낫지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: O virgin, the daughter of Egypt
in vain shalt thou use many medicines
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 여러 약을 써도 헛될 것이다

sentences.original_text: for thou shalt not be cured
